related_post.text: ugh but why would you need to implement `__call__` ?

so_post.text: I dont know I was inpsired by this https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5824881/pythoncallspecialmethodpracticalexample/5826283 then again I was purposely looking for an application of `__call__` so take it with a grain of salt

comments: Pascasio asked a rethorical question regarding the use of __user__ after another user mentioned using it and , who made the initial comment about using it, mentioned they were inspired by this post.
